verses.verse: But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> to the Mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives. <S%G1636><s%>

And early <S%G3722><s%> in the morning <S%G3722><s%> He came <S%G3854><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into the temple, <S%G2413><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> were coming <S%G2064><s%> to Him; and He sat <S%G2523><s%> down <S%G2523><s%> and [began] to teach <S%G1321><s%> them.

And the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> brought <S%G71><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> caught <S%G2638><s%> in adultery, <S%G3430><s%> and having set <S%G2476><s%> her in the midst, <S%G3319><s%>
they said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> has been caught <S%G2638><s%> in adultery, <S%G3431><s%> in the very <S%G7024><s%> act. <S%G7024><s%>

"Now <S%G1161><s%> in the Law <S%G3551><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> commanded <S%G1781><s%> us to stone <S%G3034><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> women; <S%G5108><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> do You say <S%G3004><s%>?"

And they were saying <S%G3004><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> testing <S%G3985><s%> Him, in order <S%G2443><s%> that they might have <S%G2192><s%> grounds for accusing <S%G2723><s%> Him. But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stooped <S%G2955><s%> down, <S%G2736><s%> and with His finger <S%G1147><s%> wrote <S%G7103><s%> on the ground. <S%G1093><s%>

But when <S%G5613><s%> they persisted <S%G1961><s%> in asking <S%G2065><s%> Him, He straightened <S%G352><s%> up, and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "He who is without <S%G361><s%> sin <S%G361><s%> among you, let him [be the] first <S%G4413><s%> to throw <S%G906><s%> a stone <S%G3037><s%> at her."
And again <S%G3825><s%> He stooped <S%G7107><s%> down, <S%G7107><s%> and wrote <S%G1125><s%> on the ground. <S%G1093><s%>

And when they heard <S%G191><s%> it, they [began] to go <S%G1831><s%> out one <S%G1520><s%> by one, <S%G1520><s%> beginning <S%G757><s%> with the older <S%G4245><s%> ones, <S%G4245><s%> and He was left <S%G2641><s%> alone, <S%G3441><s%> and the woman, <S%G1135><s%> where she was, in the midst. <S%G3319><s%>

And straightening <S%G352><s%> up, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "Woman, <S%G1135><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> are they? Did no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> condemn <S%G2632><s%> you?"

And she said, <S%G3004><s%> "No <S%G3762><s%> one, <S%G3762><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>" And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Neither <S%G3761><s%> do I condemn <S%G2632><s%> you; go <S%G4198><s%> your way. <S%G4198><s%> From now <S%G3568><s%> on sin <S%G264><s%> no <S%G3371><s%> more. <S%G3371><s%>" ]

Again <S%G3825><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "I am <S%G1510><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> of the world; <S%G2889><s%> he who follows <S%G190><s%> Me shall not walk <S%G4043><s%> in the darkness, <S%G4653><s%> but shall have <S%G2192><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>"

The Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "You are bearing <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of Yourself; <S%G4572><s%> Your witness <S%G3141><s%> is not true. <S%G227><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Even <S%G2579><s%> if <S%G2579><s%> I bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of Myself, <S%G1683><s%> My witness <S%G3141><s%> is true; <S%G227><s%> for I know <S%G3609><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> I came <S%G2064><s%> from, and where <S%G4226><s%> I am going; <S%G5217><s%> but you do not know <S%G3609><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> from, or <S%G2228><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> I am going. <S%G5217><s%>
"You people judge <S%G2919><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh; <S%G4561><s%> I am not judging <S%G2919><s%> anyone. <S%G3762><s%>

"But even <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I do judge, <S%G2919><s%> My judgment <S%G2920><s%> is true; <S%G228><s%> for I am <S%G1510><s%> not alone <S%G3441><s%> [in it,] but I and He who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me.
"Even <S%G2532><s%> in your law <S%G3551><s%> it has been written, <S%G1125><s%> that the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G444><s%> is true. <S%G227><s%>
"I am <S%G1510><s%> He who bears <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of Myself, <S%G1683><s%> and the Father <S%G3962><s%> who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me bears <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of Me."

And so <S%G3767><s%> they were saying <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Where <S%G4226><s%> is Your Father <S%G3962><s%>?" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "You know <S%G3609><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> Me, nor <S%G3777><s%> My Father; <S%G3962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you knew <S%G3609><s%> Me, you would know <S%G3609><s%> My Father <S%G3962><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>"

These <S%G3778><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> He spoke <S%G2980><s%> in the treasury, <S%G1049><s%> as He taught <S%G1321><s%> in the temple; <S%G2413><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> seized <S%G4084><s%> Him, because <S%G3754><s%> His hour <S%G5610><s%> had not yet <S%G3768><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

He said <S%G3004><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to them, "I go <S%G5217><s%> away, <S%G5217><s%> and you shall seek <S%G2212><s%> Me, and shall die <S%G599><s%> in your sin; <S%G266><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> I am going, <S%G5217><s%> you cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>"

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Surely <S%G3385><s%> He will not kill <S%G615><s%> Himself, <S%G1438><s%> will He, since <S%G3754><s%> He says, <S%G3004><s%> 'Where <S%G3699><s%> I am going, <S%G5217><s%> you cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> come <S%G2064><s%>'?"

And He was saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, "You are from below, <S%G2736><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> from above; <S%G507><s%> you are of this <S%G3778><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not of this <S%G3778><s%> world. <S%G2889><s%>

"I said <S%G3004><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to you, that you shall die <S%G599><s%> in your sins; <S%G266><s%> for unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you believe <S%G4100><s%> that I am <S%G1510><s%> [He], you shall die <S%G599><s%> in your sins. <S%G266><s%>"

And so <S%G3767><s%> they were saying <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Who <S%G5101><s%> are You?" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "What <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5101><s%> have I been saying <S%G2980><s%> to you [from] the beginning <S%G746><s%>?

"I have <S%G2192><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things <S%G4183><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> and to judge <S%G2919><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> you, but He who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me is true; <S%G227><s%> and the things which <S%G3739><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> from Him, these <S%G3778><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> to the world. <S%G2889><s%>"
They did not realize <S%G1097><s%> that He had been speaking <S%G3004><s%> to them about the Father. <S%G3962><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "When <S%G3752><s%> you lift <S%G5312><s%> up the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man, <S%G444><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> you will know <S%G1097><s%> that I am <S%G1510><s%> [He,] and I do <S%G4160><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> on My own <S%G1683><s%> initiative, <S%G1683><s%> but I speak <S%G2980><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> as the Father <S%G3962><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> Me.

"And He who sent <S%G3992><s%> Me is with Me; He has not left <S%G863><s%> Me alone, <S%G3441><s%> for I always <S%G3842><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the things <S%G701><s%> that are pleasing <S%G701><s%> to Him."
As He spoke <S%G2980><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> came to believe <S%G4100><s%> in Him.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> was saying <S%G3004><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> who had believed <S%G4100><s%> Him, "If <S%G1437><s%> you abide <S%G3306><s%> in My word, <S%G3056><s%> [then] you are truly <S%G230><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> of Mine; <S%G1473><s%>
and you shall know <S%G1097><s%> the truth, <S%G225><s%> and the truth <S%G225><s%> shall make <S%G1659><s%> you free. <S%G1659><s%> "

They answered <S%G611><s%> Him, "We are Abraham's offspring, <S%G4690><s%> and have never <S%G3762><s%> <S%G4455><s%> yet <S%G4455><s%> been enslaved <S%G1398><s%> to anyone; <S%G3762><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> is it that You say, <S%G3004><s%> 'You shall become <S%G1096><s%> free <S%G1658><s%>' ?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, "Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, everyone <S%G3956><s%> who commits <S%G4160><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> is the slave <S%G1401><s%> of sin. <S%G266><s%>
"And the slave <S%G1401><s%> does not remain <S%G3306><s%> in the house <S%G3614><s%> forever; <S%G165><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> does remain <S%G3306><s%> forever. <S%G165><s%>
"If <S%G1437><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> shall make <S%G1659><s%> you free, <S%G1659><s%> you shall be free <S%G1658><s%> indeed. <S%G3689><s%>

"I know <S%G3609><s%> that you are Abraham's offspring; <S%G4690><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> you seek <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> Me, because <S%G3754><s%> My word <S%G3056><s%> has <S%G5562><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> place <S%G5562><s%> in you.

"I speak <S%G2980><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> I have seen <S%G3708><s%> with [My] Father; <S%G3962><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> you heard <S%G191><s%> from [your] father. <S%G3962><s%>"

They answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Abraham <S%G11><s%> is our father. <S%G3962><s%>" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "If <S%G1487><s%> you are Abraham <S%G11><s%>'s children, <S%G5043><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the deeds <S%G2041><s%> of Abraham.

"But as it is, you are seeking <S%G2212><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> Me, a man <S%G444><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> has told <S%G2980><s%> you the truth, <S%G225><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> from God; <S%G2316><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> did not do. <S%G4160><s%>

"You are doing <S%G4160><s%> the deeds <S%G2041><s%> of your father. <S%G3962><s%>" They said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "We were not born <S%G1080><s%> of fornication; <S%G4202><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> [even] God. <S%G2316><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "If <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> were your Father, <S%G3962><s%> you would love <S%G25><s%> Me; for I proceeded <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> and have <S%G2240><s%> come <S%G2240><s%> from God, <S%G2316><s%> for I have not even <S%G3761><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> on My own <S%G1683><s%> initiative, <S%G1683><s%> but He sent <S%G649><s%> Me.

"Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> do you not understand <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G2981><s%> I am saying <S%G2981><s%>? [It is] because <S%G3754><s%> you cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> My word. <S%G3056><s%>

"You are of [your] father <S%G3962><s%> the devil, <S%G1228><s%> and you want <S%G2309><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> the desires <S%G1939><s%> of your father. <S%G3962><s%> He was a murderer <S%G443><s%> from the beginning, <S%G746><s%> and does not stand <S%G4739><s%> in the truth, <S%G225><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> there is no <S%G3756><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> in him. Whenever <S%G3752><s%> he speaks <S%G2980><s%> a lie, <S%G5579><s%> he speaks <S%G2980><s%> from his own <S%G2398><s%> [nature;] for he is a liar, <S%G5583><s%> and the father <S%G3962><s%> of lies. <S%G846><s%>
"But because <S%G3754><s%> I speak <S%G3004><s%> the truth, <S%G225><s%> you do not believe <S%G4100><s%> Me.

"Which <S%G5101><s%> one <S%G5101><s%> of you convicts <S%G1651><s%> Me of sin <S%G266><s%>? If <S%G1487><s%> I speak <S%G3004><s%> truth, <S%G225><s%> why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> do you not believe <S%G4100><s%> Me?

"He who is of God <S%G2316><s%> hears <S%G191><s%> the words <S%G4487><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> for this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> you do not hear <S%G191><s%> [them,] because <S%G3754><s%> you are not of God. <S%G2316><s%>"

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Do we not say <S%G3004><s%> rightly <S%G2573><s%> that You are a Samaritan <S%G4541><s%> and have <S%G2192><s%> a demon <S%G1140><s%>?"
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "I do not have <S%G2192><s%> a demon; <S%G1140><s%> but I honor <S%G5091><s%> My Father, <S%G3962><s%> and you dishonor <S%G818><s%> Me.
"But I do not seek <S%G2212><s%> My glory; <S%G1391><s%> there is One who seeks <S%G2212><s%> and judges. <S%G2919><s%>

"Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> keeps <S%G5083><s%> My word <S%G3056><s%> he shall never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> see <S%G2334><s%> death. <S%G2288><s%>"

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Now <S%G3568><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> that You have <S%G2192><s%> a demon. <S%G1140><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> died, <S%G599><s%> and the prophets <S%G4396><s%> [also]; and You say, <S%G3004><s%> 'If <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> keeps <S%G5083><s%> My word, <S%G3056><s%> he shall never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> taste <S%G1089><s%> of death. <S%G2288><s%>'

"Surely <S%G3361><s%> You are not greater <S%G3173><s%> than our father <S%G3962><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> died <S%G599><s%>? The prophets <S%G4396><s%> died <S%G599><s%> too; <S%G2532><s%> whom <S%G5101><s%> do You make <S%G4160><s%> Yourself <S%G4572><s%> out [to be]?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> I glorify <S%G1392><s%> Myself, <S%G1683><s%> My glory <S%G1391><s%> is nothing; <S%G3762><s%> it is My Father <S%G3962><s%> who glorifies <S%G1392><s%> Me, of whom <S%G3739><s%> you say, <S%G3004><s%> 'He is our God <S%G2316><s%>' ;

and you have not come to know <S%G1097><s%> Him, but I know <S%G3609><s%> Him; and if <S%G2579><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> that I do not know <S%G3609><s%> Him, I shall be a liar <S%G5583><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> you, but I do know <S%G3609><s%> Him, and keep <S%G5083><s%> His word. <S%G3056><s%>
"Your father <S%G3962><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> rejoiced <S%G21><s%> to see <S%G3708><s%> My day, <S%G2250><s%> and he saw <S%G3708><s%> [it] and was glad. <S%G5463><s%>"

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "You are not yet <S%G3768><s%> fifty <S%G4004><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> old, and have You seen <S%G3708><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%>?"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, before <S%G4250><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> was born, <S%G1096><s%> I am. <S%G1510><s%>"

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> they picked <S%G142><s%> up stones <S%G3037><s%> to throw <S%G906><s%> at Him; but Jesus <S%G2424><s%> hid <S%G2928><s%> Himself, and went <S%G1831><s%> out of the temple. <S%G2413><s%>
